title: How to Make Honey Roasted Peanuts

steps.headline: Heat butter and honey together, in microwave or on stove top, stirring well; Toss with peanuts.

Spread peanuts on a cookie sheet and bake at 350 °F (177 °C) for 5 to 10 minutes; After the first 5 minutes, check them and stir every 1 or 2 minutes until peanuts are golden brown - the glaze will thicken and darken.
Remove, stir while cooling for 5-10 minutes until they no longer stick together.
Sprinkle with salt (Optional) or mix it in with the honey and butter mixture; you can also toss with sugar.

text: Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C)  Place peanuts in a bowl  Heat butter and honey together, in microwave or on stove top, stirring well; Toss with peanuts.  Spread peanuts on a cookie sheet and bake at 350 °F (177 °C) for 5 to 10 minutes; After the first 5 minutes, check them and stir every 1 or 2 minutes until peanuts are golden brown - the glaze will thicken and darken.  Remove, stir while cooling for 5-10 minutes until they no longer stick together.  Sprinkle with salt (Optional) or mix it in with the honey and butter mixture; you can also toss with sugar.  Eat Share and Enjoy!
